title: Crime Alert 01.13.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 01.13.21
description:
Young mom heads out for a night of partying, leaving her 1-year-old locking in the car. Car thief rams into officer, breaking her pelvis in a bid to escape.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
